title: Anti Vaxxers = Smart? Chet Hanks = Alt Right Influencer? 8.19.21
itunes:title: Anti Vaxxers = Smart? Chet Hanks = Alt Right Influencer? 8.19.21
description:
In episode 972 Jack and Miles are joined by Garrison Davis of Cool Zone Media to discuss Gov. Abbott having COVID, Sacklers holding a $4.5B settlement hostage, Vaccine Hesitancy Highest Among PhDs, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. TDZ LIVE SHOW TICKETS!
  2. Abbott has COVID
  3. Sacklers are holding $4.5B settlement hostage…
  4. Vaccine Hesitancy Highest Among PhDs
  5. LISTEN: Khruangbin - “Dearest Alfred”
